name: UpDownLeftRight
description:
~ Made for Adelaide Global Game Jam ~

HOW TO PLAY:

* When prompted: Use the arrow keys to select a direction to move in.

* The arrow key in the opposite direction than your moving in is your break. (always be breaking!!) <-limited per screen

* Want to go faster? Press down the arrow key of the direction you are moving in.

* Use the other arrow keys to move your spacecraft.

GOALS:

[1] Save the Astronauts

[2] Avoid Space Rocks

[3] High Score Get

(Each screen is randomly coloured, some are easier than others to see whats going on.)

KEYBOARD CONTROLS:

- ESC Key: FullScreen/Windowed mode Switch

- UP Arrow

- DOWN Arrow

- LEFT Arrow

- RIGHT Arrow
